tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_gps_data (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_positions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE GPSData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
vehicle_id INT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP,
latitude DECIMAL,
longitude DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE VehicleSpeed (vehicle_id INT,
speed DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
               vehicle_type TEXT,
               manufacturer TEXT,
               model TEXT,
               year INT)

CREATE TABLE GPSData (data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
              vehicle_id UUID,
              timestamp TIMESTAMP,
              latitude FLOAT,
              longitude FLOAT,
              speed FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE SpeedLimit (limit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                 road_type TEXT,
                 max_speed FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE SpeedingEvent (event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                   data_id UUID,
                   speed_limit_id UUID,
                   violation_distance FLOAT,
                   violation_time INTERVAL)

CREATE TABLE VehicleSpeedHistory (history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                          vehicle_id UUID,
                          timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                          speed FLOAT)
